tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE fashion_sales_data (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    category VARCHAR(50),
    unit_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity_sold INT,
    sale_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Sales (
    sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    sale_date DATE,
    sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE Inventory (
    product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    product_name VARCHAR(255),
    stock_quantity INT,
    last_stock_update TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE Trends (
    trend_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_start_date DATE,
    trend_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE products (
   product_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   name VARCHAR(255),
   category VARCHAR(255),
   price DECIMAL(10, 2),
   quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE sales (
   sale_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   product_id INT,
   retailer_id INT,
   sale_date DATE,
   sale_amount DECIMAL(10, 2)
);
CREATE TABLE retailers ( id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, location VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, industry VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL );

CREATE TABLE products (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, price DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, category VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, retailer_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (retailer_id) REFERENCES retailers(id));
CREATE TABLE sales (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, product_id INT NOT NULL, sale_date DATE NOT NULL, quantity INT NOT NULL, amount DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id));
CREATE TABLE trends (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, description TEXT);
CREATE TABLE inventory (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, product_id INT NOT NULL, quantity INT NOT NULL, last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (product_id) REFERENCES products(id));
